short_summary: MSG-3 Training for Civil Aviation Inspectors
description: Transport Canada is seeking a service provider who can provide a specialized course on MSG-3 Methodology using an impartial approach of any manufacturer/operator.
full_summary:
===============

**MSG-3 Training for Civil Aviation Inspectors**

**Notice Type:** Advance Contract Award Notice

**Reference Number:** CB-403-91924162

**Solicitation Number:** T8080-230402
**Tender Closing Date:** 02-Feb-2024 14:00:00

**Goods or Services Description:** Transport Canada is seeking a service provider to deliver a specialized training course on MSG-3 Methodology. The training will be conducted in-person at a Transport Canada facility, under the supervision of the Project Authority. The course will include instructor-led presentation, participant materials such as handouts and exercises.

**Expected Contract Duration:** 2024-02-19 to 2027-03-31

**Trade Agreements:** This notice is covered by the Open Government Goods and Services Open Contracting Standard along with the WTO GPA and Canada’s Free Trade Agreements.

**Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
**Regions of Delivery:** Canada

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Fanie Charron
* Email: fanie.charron@tc.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 574-8173

**Notice Documentation:**

Please visit [CanadaBuys CIHI ] for the complete tender documentation ( https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29843/acan---t8080-230402---en.pdf )
